I will attach a WSDL file and a screenshot to explain what I mean.

1) Open the attached WSDL file in design.
2) Go to "Inline schema of WortDerWocheService.wsdl" (blue arrow on the right side of the graph).
3) Select "WortDerWocheBean"
5) in the properties tab select "Extensions".
